name: It Is not Desert
description:
The year is 2202. The world is now a nightmare after surviving a massive nuclear fallout. The world government has implanted VR lenses into everyone at birth to keep the peace while they and the elite prepare to leave the planet.

Luckily(?) for you, your lenses have malfunctioned and you see glimpses of the real world. It is up to you to stop the corrupt elite!

This game was made for Brackeys 2022.1 Game Jam! It was our first game, and all of us are beginners to both coding and Unity. We had a ton of fun working together and learned a lot. To us, this  was a total win in itself. 

If you like what you see, do leave us a rating at the Game Jam page! Feedback is always welcome. :)

  • Credits to team:
    May
    Shawn
    Alex
    Kiat King

Music
Chiptronical - Patrick De Arteaga
Playdate (8-Bit Remix by Zane Dobler) - Melanie Martinez

P.S. This game is definitely Buggy with a capital B. We even forgot to put an icon for the game and to rename the build.... But most things should work!
